TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit CultureNotFoundException extends System.ArgumentException implements class System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable
type CultureNotFoundException = class inherit ArgumentException interface ISerializable

summary.span: 當方法嘗試建構無法使用的文化特性時，會擲回例外狀況。

span.span: The exception that is thrown when a method attempts to construct a culture that is not available.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A每當內方法最後嘗試進行無效的文化特性的建構，會擲回例外狀況。A exception is thrown whenever the construction of an invalid culture is eventually attempted within a method. 大多數情況下，呼叫下列方法之一，就無法建立或傳回的文化特性時，便會擲回這個例外狀況：Most commonly, this exception is thrown when a call to one of the following methods fails to create or return a culture: - 建構函式。 constructors. - 方法The method. - 方法The method. > [!WARNING] > 在 Windows 7 和更新版本的作業系統，.NET Framework 會從作業系統擷取文化特性的資料。On Windows 7 and later operating systems, the .NET Framework retrieves culture data from the operating system. 如果作業系統是找不到的文化特性與文化特性不是自訂的文化特性或取代的文化特性，會擲回例外狀況。The exception is thrown if the operating system is unable to find the culture, and the culture is not a custom culture or a replacement culture. 如果呼叫程式碼嘗試具現化物件使用的文化特性名稱，屬性包含無效的名稱，而屬性所傳回的物件屬性是`false`.If the calling code attempted to instantiate a object by using a culture name, the property contains the invalid name, and the property of the object returned by the property is `false`. 如果呼叫程式碼嘗試具現化使用的文化特性識別項的物件屬性所傳回的物件屬性包含無效的識別項，而屬性是`null`。If the calling code attempted to instantiate a object by using a culture identifier, the property of the object returned by the property contains the invalid identifier, and the value of the property is `null`. 會使用 HRESULT COR_E_ARGUMENT，其值 0x80070057。 uses the HRESULT COR_E_ARGUMENT, which has the value 0x80070057.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 會使用 HRESULT COR_E_ARGUMENT，其值 0x80070057。 uses the HRESULT COR_E_ARGUMENT, which has the value 0x80070057.

public: CultureNotFoundException();

summary.span: 使用將其訊息字串設定為系統提供的訊息，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with its message string set to a system-supplied message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 會使用 HRESULT COR_E_ARGUMENT，其值 0x80070057。 uses the HRESULT COR_E_ARGUMENT, which has the value 0x80070057.

public: CultureNotFoundException(System::String ^ message);
new System.Globalization.CultureNotFoundException : string -> System.Globalization.CultureNotFoundException

param.name: message
param.span: 與這個例外狀況一起顯示的錯誤訊息。

span.span: The error message to display with this exception.

summary.span: 使用指定的錯誤訊息，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified error message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式初始化屬性使用的值的新執行個體`message`參數。This constructor initializes the property of the new instance using the value of the `message` parameter. `message` 參數的內容必須能讓人了解。The content of the `message` parameter is intended to be understood by humans. 這個建構函式的呼叫端必須確保這個字串已經被當地語系化 (為了目前系統的文化特性)。The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture. 會使用 HRESULT COR_E_ARGUMENT，其值 0x80070057。 uses the HRESULT COR_E_ARGUMENT, which has the value 0x80070057.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified serialization data and context.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 進行還原序列化 (Deserialization) 期間會呼叫這個建構函式，以便重新構成經由資料流傳送的例外狀況物件。This constructor is called during deserialization to reconstitute the exception object transmitted over a stream.

param.span: 如果 參數不是 null 參考，目前的例外狀況會在處理內部例外的 區塊中引發。

span.span: If the parameter is not a null reference, the current exception is raised in a block that handles the inner exception.

summary.span: 使用指定的錯誤訊息以及造成此例外狀況的內部例外狀況的參考，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式初始化屬性使用的值的新執行個體`message`參數。This constructor initializes the property of the new instance using the value of the `message` parameter. `message` 參數的內容必須能讓人了解。The content of the `message` parameter is intended to be understood by humans. 這個建構函式的呼叫端必須確保這個字串已經被當地語系化 (為了目前系統的文化特性)。The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture. 被擲回以做為前一個例外狀況直接結果的例外狀況，應該在 屬性中包含對前一個例外狀況的參考。An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the property. 屬性會傳回與傳入建構函式中相同的值；如果 `null` 屬性沒有提供內部例外值給建構函式，則傳回 。The property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or `null` if the property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor.
